references.paper_title: Graph neural networks: A review of methods and applications
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of graph neural networks, which are central to the applications discussed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: A unified framework for optimization-based graph coarsening
references.reason: This work offers a framework for optimization-based graph coarsening that directly relates to the core methodology of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Graph reduction with spectral and cut guarantees
references.reason: This paper delves into graph reduction methods with spectral and cut guarantees, foundational to the concept of graph coarsening explored in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Beyond homophily in graph neural networks: Current limitations and effective designs
references.reason: This research explores the limitations of homophily in graph neural networks, directly addressing a key challenge that the target paper aims to overcome.

references.paper_title: Semi-supervised classification with graph convolutional networks
references.reason: This work introduces semi-supervised classification with graph convolutional networks, providing essential background for the GNN applications explored in the target paper.
